Chinese.name: HTTPDNS自定义解析函数
Chinese.description: 基于事件函数和API网关，提供移动解析HTTPDNS软件自定义解析服务，支持自定义参数和返回值。
Chinese.attention: 本示例需要配合移动解析HTTPDNS软件自定义解析、API网关使用。

English.name: SdnsHook
English.description: This example provides HTTPDNS software DNS service based on event function and API gateway, and supports custom parameters and returned values.
English.attention: This example needs to be used with HTTPDNS software DNS and API gateway trigger.
